EmailTemplate.SendContactInviteTemplate:
Dear {receiver_name},

{sender_company_name} has requested to be part of your contact list on XLOG.

Your contact list will be useful in associating a company's XLOG account as a shipper/consignee/notify party in your transaction.

To confirm:

  1. Log in using your account.
  2. Go to Settings > Contacts and Preferred Provider
  3. Under Contacts Tab, click on Add Registered
  4. Inputinvite code {invite_code}
  5. Once the invitee company is shown, click Add.

Note: This invite is valid and applicable only to a registered company/user in XLOG. This link will expire in 48 hours from the time it was sent.

To login, click {login_link}

If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Service at info@myxlog.com

Thank You.

XLOG Team
EmailTemplate.SendProviderInviteTemplate:
Dear {receiver_name},

{sender_company_name} has requested to be a preferred service provider on your XLOG account.

Preferred service providers will be prioritized by the platform when searching for potential vendors for your requirement.

To confirm:

  1. Log in using your account.
  2. Go to Settings > Contacts and Preferred Provider
  3. Under Preferred Providers Tab, click on Add Registered
  4. Input invite code {invite_code}.
  5. Once the Registered Provider is shown, click Add..

Note: This invite is valid and applicable only to a registered company/user in XLOG. This link will expire in 48 hours from the time it was sent.

To login, click {login_link}

If you have any questions, please contact our Customer Service at info@myxlog.com

Thank You.

XLOG Team
